contest-event.event-date:
April 25, 1971 D Blackpool Contest (A Section)
Blackpool Contest (A Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest-a-section
South Pier, Blackpool, Lancashire Best soloist - euphonium of Mossley. Best basses - Mossley. Prizes - 1st £60 and trophy, 2nd £25 and trophy, 3rd £15. 20th annual contest 5 bands competed.
April 9, 2012, 11:27 a.m. April 10, 2017, 8:31 a.m.
1 Mossley Band John Harrison Symphony of Marches
2 Poulton-Le-Fylde Band G. G. Lloyd Romeo and Juliet [unknown composer, unknown arranger]
3 Haydock Band Harry Oakes Life Divine
3 Lancashire Constabulary Band Frank Hough Lorenzo
Unknown Result Brindle Band Richard Evans The Corsair
Withdrawn Blackpool Brass John Victor Ayling
